entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `startup.ts` has a fixed "max parallel downloads", but that can fail #68992
  • .NET 7 Android apps crash if trimmed #68987
  • StreamReader.Peek() on a DeflateStream returns -1 early #68983
  • GetAssemblyName() test scenario should skip for singlefile and aot form factors #68980
  • Logger using json format not display lists correctly #68975
  • [API Proposal]: Merge TarEntry's DeviceMajor and DeviceMinor into a single API #68974
    7.0.0
  • EBCDIC en/decoding in System.Text does not work #68970
  • [API Proposal]: MultipartContent.cs constructor or public property to control usage of double quotes in boundary #68968
  • [API Proposal]: Enable DNS Round Robin as a configurable option for SocketsHttpHandler #68967
  • [Analyzer]: Regex analyzers #68962
    Future
  • File.Copy on macOS wrong escape of characters #68960
  • [API Proposal]: Additional Regex.EnumerateMatches overload #68959
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback to allow invalid TLS certification isn't working #68958
  • failfast in native code invoked by MsQuicStream.Dispose in CI #68954
  • Huge performance regression during JIT code generation with ILGenerator on .NET 6.0 (Windows x64) #68953
    7.0.0
  • Reduce unnecessary allocations in TLS handshake (windows) #68951
  • Way to unload a Managed assembly from native library using hostfxr #68949
  • Support value numbering of multi-dimensional array accesses #68948
    Future
  • Support multi-dimensional array `Set` intrinsic for struct element types #68947
    Future
  • [Analyzer proposal]: Simplify calls to string.Substring and Memory/Span.Slice #68946

Closed

  • Remove type forward suppressions in the package validation suppression files when the tooling understands those #56823
    7.0.0
  • [ARM/Linux] coreclr fails due to lack of DWARF feature in libunwind #6479
    Future
  • dotnet crashes on rhel8 arm64 while unwinding stack #68640
  • Add UTF8 (and maybe UTF16) to System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet + Marshal class #4257
    Future
  • VB default ByVal marshalling behavior is actually VBByRefStr and it truncates MBCS input #9944
    Future
  • Add support for LPArray when marshalling struct fields #8719
    Future
  • [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray, SizeParamIndex = 1, ArraySubType = UnmanagedType.LPUTF8Str)] results in "Cannot marshal 'parameter #3': Unknown error." #7315
    Future
  • CI failure in runtime (mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64/x64 release) legs #68971
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize consumes CPU and memory that it never returns #67369
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization not Deserialize inheritance class #67641
  • Ran out of trampolines of type 3 in 'mscorlib.dll' (limit 512) #68969
  • [release/5.0] Should we revert adding libssl3 dependency to enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04? #67986
    5.0.x
  • ucol_safeClone deprecated in ICU 71.1 #68814
    7.0.0
  • HttpHeaders thread safety and behavior of invalid values #61798
    7.0.0
  • Add target to ApiCompat.proj that determines when the baseline shrinks #28571
    Future
  • SupportedFramework apply to all versions of a reference assembly #24458
    Future
  • [release/6.0] Always build the ref-pack in servicing #64013
    6.0.x
  • Inbox assets which ship as part of packages aren't crossgend #58500
    Future
  • Delete old workflow run entries from backport pipeline #68440
    Future
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility should reference the latest System.Data.SqlClient #60345
    6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Add area owners file to ensure that there is a packaging review on the servicing-approved prs #60743
    3.1.x
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 6 for Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #62218
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Remove setter of Capacity Property in the BoundedChannelOptions class #68936
  • Temporarily disabling Win-ARM64 testing in PR #68626
  • Reevaluate tests/tests*OutsideWindows.txt files for .NET Core 2.0 #7726
    Future
  • [x86/Linux] Stackwalking with fixed out arguments #7761
    Future
  • LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests fail in all PR #68932
  • Consider reference counter as alternative garbage collector #4029
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix wording in failure to load native library #68995
  • Revert "Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation"" #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Normalize S.S.Cryptography's ref.cs file #68993
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Allow some lazy loops to upgrade with auto-atomicity #68989
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc debugger improvements #68988
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable source generator support #68985
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support Requires on type in NativeAot #68978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange for UIntPtr #68966
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Don't return SslStreamBuffer when disposing during handshake #68956
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CoreRT to NativeAOT renames #68950
    area-Meta
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono][llvm] Fix support for --break + LLVM. #68982
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to latest #68899
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow running System.Reflection tests on NativeAOT #67575
    area-System.Reflection
  • Break ExtensionsTests.cs into one file per type tested #68977
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the Version.Details.xml entry for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnaly… #68973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #68965
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Throw from MsQuicImplementationProvider if not supported. #68833
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add WaitAsync to prevent CI hangs of System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #68955
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Revert "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop" #68940
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Deprecate ICU ucol_safeClone and support ucol_clone #68847
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Apply changes from #63356 #68864
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add a cleanup job to backport workflow #68596
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [MONO][TEST] Disabled k-nucleotide test on mono #68910
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix double-validation in BoundedChannelOptions #68938
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Fix Regex handling of control characters #68944
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Reenable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs #68922
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ApiCompat to exclude UnsupportedOSPlatform["freebsd"] on Lock/Unlock #68941
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink/ActivityEvent: Implement EnumerateTagObjects API #68933
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add Mac ARM64 coverage to runtime-dev-innerloop #68886
  • Fix System.Collections.Immutable version in ILCompiler.Build.Tasks #68935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Rename CoreRT to NativeAOT (1/N) #68888
    area-Meta
  • Enable dumping of R2R manifest metadata from ildasm #68920
    area-ILTools-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68925
    area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experimental - add system.runtime tests to aot #68904
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reset the bbNatLoopNum of block for removed loop #68804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update generators.targets #68860
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop IHostedService instances asynchronously by default #68216
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reenable `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #68921
    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • WIP: Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Docker fixes for the enterprise linux testing pipeline #68913
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Call simpler overloads of Substring and Slice #68937
    area-Meta
  • Fix ProfileOptimization test #68943
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Package Validation] Add an opt-in feature to automatically calculate the package to download for API comparison #25268
  • AnsiConsole should support NO_COLOR #25264
    7.0.1xx
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.SourceGenerators.RazorSourceGenerator cannot be created #25254
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts is not incremental #25250

Closed

  • Nuget packaging #25267
  • global.json version mismatch warning is not actionable #24429

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25274
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for opting out of ANSI coloring via NO_COLOR env. variable #25273
  • Two more tests running on helix #25272
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25258
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp2.0 to the current framework #25257
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25252
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update build.yml to target loc build at 6.0.4xx #25195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25181
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Alternate syntax to !! for null parameter checks #6099

Updated

  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Comment block conflicts with string content #61168
  • StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: This program location is thought to be unreachable. #61165
  • IDE0055 report incorrectly on region define in pragma #61163
  • Not generating empty source, when last syntax node is deleted in Visual Studio 2022 #61162
  • `Replace method with property` refactoring sometimes eats new line #61161
  • Cleanup on save when fixing merge conflicts removes ALL usings #61159

Closed

  • SyntaxTree generated XML document comments attribute params source text incorrect #60884

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of SourceText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Properly create virtual-char sequences for raw-string-literals #61157
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Feedback about ASP.Net ExternalAccess PR #61152
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61158
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update light bulb workarounds to apply through 17.2 Preview 6 #61151
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove extra new line character from end of file #61056
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC #61032
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR-Response status code does not indicate success: 400 (Request on loopback from external IP) #41559
  • Kestrel Server hangs after Out of memory exception ("The connection listener failed to accept any new connections") #41556
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor Form Two Way Binding with Expando Object or Dictionary<string, dynamic> #41554
  • [Blazor] Remove some file in _content from publish #41551

Closed

  • MultipartReader - BodyLengthLimit is not the total length #41479
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Blazor Server App - Rename default .AspNetCore. cookie name #41560
  • HttpClient from HttpClientFactory is faulty after call to offline Redis cache #41553
  • IIS: % in URL is double-unescaped #41168
    6.0.6
  • Potential memory leak with Blazor Webassembly when using an iframe in a razor component #41537
  • my token is always null in app Blazor server Net 6 VS 2022 #41539
  • Is a Null Header Value a Set header value? #4754
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor WASM: Misleading error message when calling DotNetObjectReference.invokeMethod and then calling JSRuntime.InvokeAsync<T> #41438
  • Add ability to register IHubContext<T> service in DI #41538
  • Blazor, OnTimeUpdate and similar events: make argument more specific and clear #41528
  • Blazor Hybrid is not as fast running Parallel code in Release mode #41439

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix documentation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41565
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Make SignalR Redis test thread-safe #41564
    area-signalr
  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Tratcher/h2ws #41558
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Fix failing test on machine using en-GB #41534
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix description for MultipartReader.BodyLengthLimit #41479 #41543
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41562
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Updates selenium dependencies #41557
    7.0-preview5
  • Implemented test to monitor issue 4754 #41542
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Port template test fixes from release/6.0 #41549
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `af29db7` to `8ded48c` #41460
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Add dotnet dev-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Update Grpc.Core.Api version to 2.45.0 and support write cancellation #41525
    area-grpc
  • [Blazor] Unquarantine component E2E tests that were quarantined because of an SDK issue #41494
    area-blazor
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exporting some JPGs on Android rotates the image #6915
  • Sample counter app is broken on macOS Monterey 12.3.1 (Xcode version 13.2.1 ) #6914
  • IImage.AsBytes() takes float quality 0..1 but complains about quality not being 0..100 when 50 is entered #6913
  • IImageLoadingService cannot load image on Windows #6911
  • Setting the SearchHandler at the Shell level should allow for an app-wide search #6910
  • IImage.Resize on Android always returns an object with **System.ObjectDisposedException:** 'Cannot access a disposed object. #6909
  • App Title Bar doesn't show the app icon #6908
  • [Entry] Avoid transforming the text when `IsPassword` is set to true #6906
  • [Windows] ListView ItemsSource refreshing throws error after 60+ times #6905
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Is there a prescribed way to include generated content files as static assets? #6904
  • Essentials - MediaPicker add method to select multiple images #6903
  • iOS startup time of application #6894
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Dropping a pic to copy works on Android but not on Win #6886
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Title in flyoutitem not visible #6882
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ScrollView does not scroll with Flexlayout as a child #6881
    6.0.300
  • If you change the theme after running the app, it will not be applied normally. #6876

Closed

  • CarouselView its not working on Android #6877
    6.0.300
  • Navigating via tabs and then scrolling in listview causes app to crash #6822
    6.0.300
  • Title isn't vertically centered in FlyoutItem #6706
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Margin on children of VerticalStackLayout doesn't work without resizing window #4145
    6.0.300
  • Entry.IsPassword several bugs on Windows (value from binding is not set, IsPassword cannot be changed without reseting value if from value came from binding instead of user input #6870
    6.0.300
  • Cursor jumps on Entry with IsPassword #5401
    6.0.300
  • ListView ItemsSource refreshing problems in Windows and Android, Button double activating before DisplayAlert popup #6377
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly when you rebind to a CollectionView #6783
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Crash using Shadows with Shell Flyout #6896
    6.0.300
  • Unapplying a VSM.VSGL doesn't unapply its Setters #6885
    6.0.300
  • VisualStateGroupList set from a Style aren't unapplied when the Style is unapplied #6857
    6.0.300
  • Properties set from a Setter in a VSGL in a Style have the wrong priority #6856
    6.0.300
  • VisualStateManager: Changing the Style dynamically messes up the styling of the visual states #4139
    6.0.300
  • Shell AppThemeBinding is incorrect and not consistent #6244
    6.0.300
  • Shell flyout background color does not change when behavior is set to Locked #6552
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Button text and button semantic text get focused separately #5107
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Regression: Splash screen and BackgroundImageSource not working #6838
    6.0.300
  • Border StrokeShape RoundRectangle Geometry Issue #6880
    6.0.300
  • StreamImageSource doesn't work on Image Control in Windows #6888
  • Remove the only sealed Handler (ImageButton) #6890

PullRequests

Created

  • Change iOS Shell pop to just use GotoAsync #6912
    6.0.300
  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for MAUI Essentials #6907
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] [Shell] Fix Flyout Background so it gets set in Locked behavior mode #6901
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300
  • Add Windows Icon to .exe and set Window Icon at runtime #6900
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Core and Controls.Core #6874

  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826

  • Comment out measure all strategy on iOS 15 for grouping #6878
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • [C] Various fixes related to unapplying VSM #6889
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix Share does not block when awaited on iOS #6812

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetColumnName() in EF Core 6 returns property name not mapped column name #27968
  • query/TPC : consider pruning unused columns from the TPC Union entity structure #27967
  • .NET Core CLI add migration command inconsistently using wrong DbContext constructor #27963
  • Should we read discriminator value if only one entity type will be materialized #27960
    Backlog

Closed

  • Joining another entity with list navigation property of the queried entity #27909
  • Add support for user defined aggregate window functions #27912
  • Does EFCore 6 supports table valued parameters of table valued functions? #27955
  • TypeInitialization_Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.EvaluatableExpressionFilter: Could not find property 'Now' on type 'System.DateTimeOffset' when trimmed #27936
  • Scaffolding: Disable skip navigations flag #27930
  • Nullability check in in-memory provider does not recognize default value #27913
  • How to stop Entity Framework from including related data automatically #27906
  • could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated #27905
  • How to make a method generic using lambda expressions? #27864
  • [Required] Used to get generated and be super helpful with MVC validation #27962

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Introduce EnumerableExpression which is not SQL token #27969
  • Capitalize database name #27966
  • Respect EvaluatableExpressionFilter in RelationalSqlTranslatingEV #27965
  • Remove Convert node when up-casting to an interface #27964

Merged

  • Query: Add support for TPC #27961
  • [6.0.x] Reset read count on RelationalDataReader #27852
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.6
  • [6.0.x] Return null constraint names for keys and FKs on entity types not mapped to a table. #27857
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0.x] Add [DynamicDependency] on DateOnly/TimeOnly for trimming #27910
    Servicing-approved
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.8 to 8.0.10 #27929
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27944
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
